II.i.2.A.3.b
.
Processing Claims That Are Duplicative of a Legacy or BVA Appeal
When a claimed contention is an exact match for an issue under a legacy or BVA appeal, consider the contention duplicative of the legacy or BVA appeal and follow the procedures outlined in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, 2.A.3.c
to notify the claimant the issue will be processed under the pending appeal.
When a claimed contention is not an exact match of an issue under appeal, establish a claim for the contention in accordance with
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 3.A
.
Reference
:Â  For more information on determining if a legacy appeal is duplicative, see
M21-5, Chapter 6, Section B
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - Process Overview for Screening Mail
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
